smalldes: The official Formula One racing game returns with enhanced realism, new circuits, and dynamic career mode.
largedes:
REAL RACING EVOLVED :- Feel the speed in every turn with improved physics, tire wear systems, and AI behavior.

BECOME A CHAMPION :- Start your journey in My Team mode, rise through the ranks, and dominate the F1 circuit like never before.
desc: Every millisecond matters. Rule the track.
